name: Campfire Pro
description: Complete your character design, plot manipulation, and worldbuilding all in one place. Designed to be a revolutionary tool for writers to plan out their stories, Campfire Pro has exactly what novelists and screenwriters need to go from the seed of an idea to a detailed plan that’s ready to be executed.
minimum_requirements: İşletim Sistemi: 7 Bellek: 500 MB RAM Depolama: 200 MB kullanılabilir alan
recommended_requirements: Önerilen: İşletim Sistemi: 10 Bellek: 1 GB RAM Depolama: 500 MB kullanılabilir alan
